Master Tobald:
Meet* Messenger Naran Ashanuk* of the Varka Silenos. They'll be hiring soldiers. This is a great opportunity to gain their trust! Soul Guide Udan Mardui is their chief shaman. He has the* Divine Stone of Wisdom* that we're looking for. If things don't go your way, you can switch sides and approach the Ketra Orcs. Cheer up!
